descriptionMarkdown:
I did not make this, source - https://www.reddit.com/r/factorio/comments/5p8jgl/late_game_beaconed_oil_processing_with_almost/

Beaconed 10-21-3 Almost perfect ration.

This is intended for max Petroleum production for Plastic for Advanced Circuits and Low density structure. Not for Solid fuel. I still didn't launch my first rocket so I don't know how much Light Oil you need for Rocket Fuel, Maybe build one more of this without Cracking? :)

Every Beacon has 2xSpeed Module3 and Refineries and Chem plants have 2 and 4 Productivity Module3.

I don't understand fluid dynamics very much. But I'm having trouble feeding and pumping out this beast. In the picture. Intake is on top side. Crude-Crude-Water from left to right (underground pipes). Feeding it from my Crude Oil reserves from both left and right. If I pump it in just from one side Crude can't make it to 6th-10th Refinery, even with small pump

You can see two underground pipes on right hand side in the middle, Both are for Petroleum Gas. My 16 (2*8) Petro Tanks are there. If First 2 Tanks are 1.7k/2.4k full and last 2 are 1.2k/2.k full this blocks up the two Petro pipes and last 3-4 refineries and 6-9 Chem Plants can't pump out their Petroleum. Too much Petro Gas :) I recommend putting outtake pipes one on the left side and one on the right side. That way petro pipes will stay open for more petro.

Here is the math. Im new to Factorio, please let me know if I made a mistake.

Refineries
In

10 Crude Oil per 5 sec. 2 per 1 sec. Speed 5.7(+470%) 10 Refineries

10/5*5.7*10 = **114 Crude Oil In**
Out

Heavy Oil

1 Heavy Oil per 5 sec. 0.2 per 1 sec. Speed 5.7(+470%) Productivity +20% 10 Refineries

1/5*1.2*5.7*10 = 13.68 Heavy Oil Out
Light Oil

4.5 Light Oil per 5 sec. 0.9 per 1 sec. Speed 5.7(+470%) Productivity +20% 10 Refineries

4.5/5*1.2*5.7*10 = 61.56 Light Oil Out
Petroleum Gas

5.5 Petroleum Gas per 5 sec. 1.1 per 1 sec. Speed 5.7(+470%) Productivity +20% 10 Refineries

5.5/5*1.2*5.7*10 = 75.24 Petroleum Gas Out
Chem Plant Heavy Oil Cracking
In

4 Heavy Oil per 5 sec. 0.8 per 1 sec. Speed 5.875(+370%) 3 Chem Plants

4/5*5.875*3 = 14.1 Heavy Oil In Needs 0.42 more then 10 Refineries are producing
Out

3 Light Oil per 5 sec. 0.6 per 1 sec. Speed 5.875(+370%) Productivity +20% 3 Chem Plants

3/5*1.2*5.875*3 = 12.69 Light Oil Out
Chem Plant Light Oil Cracking
In

3 Light Oil per 5 sec. 0.6 per 1 sec. Speed 5.875(+370%) 21 Chem Plants

3/5*5.875*21 = 74.025 Light Oil In.  We are producing 61.56+12.69=74.25 from Refineries+Heavy Cracking
Out

2 Petroleum Gas per 5 sec. 0.4 per 1 sec. Speed 5.875(+370%) +20% Productivity 21 Chem Plants

2/5*1.2*5.875*21 = 59.22 Petroleum Gas Out
Total Out
75.24+59.22 = **134.46 Petroleum Gas Out per second** 
This setup takes 114 Crude Oil and produces 134.46 Petroleum Gas per second (8067 per minute) with very little waste.
title: Late Game Beaconized Oil Processing
